cent.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: 1/100th of the standard unit of money in some countries. For example, there are 100 cents in one dollar or in one euro: symbol Â¢
cent.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: 0.01 of the main currency unit in some countries, for example 0.01 of a dollar or a euro
cent.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The price of oil rose 36 cents to $61.95 a barrel.
